description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Be ready for some crazy battles with your buddies in the colorfull arena of jamsouls !  Discover several addictive game modes :  -“Deathmatch”          show them who is the boss  -“Capture the flag”    create strategy that will make your opponent cry  -“Foot”             show the way you roll !  and even more !
description.short: Be ready for some crazy battles with your buddies in the colorfull arena of jamsouls !
